field.name: admin_columns_products
field.default: sku=E, image, title, published, categories, price=E, price_original=E, stock=E, access_level, language, association, hits, id
field.label: COM_PHOCACART_FIELD_COLUMNS_PRODUCT_LIST_ADMINISTRATION_LABEL

field.name: ai_premade_question_description
field.default: Create a product description based on the following information
field.label: COM_PHOCACART_AI_PRE_MADE_QUESTION_DESCRIPTION_LABEL

field.name: ai_premade_question_description_long
field.default: Create a very comprehensive description of the product based on the following information
field.label: COM_PHOCACART_AI_PRE_MADE_QUESTION_DESCRIPTION_LONG_LABEL

field.name: ai_premade_question_features
field.default: Create a very comprehensive feature list of the product based on the following information
field.label: COM_PHOCACART_AI_PRE_MADE_QUESTION_FEATURES_LABEL

field.name: ai_premade_question_metadesc
field.default: Create a very short description of the product based on the following information
field.label: COM_PHOCACART_AI_PRE_MADE_QUESTION_METADESC_LABEL
